Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.OOP.ovrloading.overloadingOperators1

[docs]class OverloadingClass():
    def __init__(self, value):
        self.data = value

    def __add__(self, other):
        return OverloadingClass(self.data + other)

    def __str__(self):
        return '["Data: %s "]' % self.data


[docs]    def mul(self, other):
        self.data *= other



[docs]    def display(self):
        print("Value: %s" % self.data)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    a = OverloadingClass('abc')
    a.display()
    print(a)

    b = a + 'xyz'
    b.display()
    print(b)

    a.mul(3)
    a.display()
    print(a)

    a1 = OverloadingClass(10)
    c = a1 + 1
    c.display()
    print(c)
